title: "University Librarians See Urgent Need for AI Ethics"
excerpt: "The need for ethics training was one of the biggest insights, Lo said. Nearly 75 percent of respondents said they agreed or strongly agreed there is an urgent need to address those AI issues. The major worries included violations of privacy and misuse of data, such as generating false citations."
